device.longDescription: The EEP "A5-20-01" specifies a heating readiator valve drive. Please note that you need a PID controller (e. g. the heating controller node in Node-BLUE) to use it. You should also note the "SERVICE_COMMAND" "SummerMode" which should always be set in summer to reduce energy consumption. It makes the actuator send packets and accept new input every few hours instead of every few minutes.

parameter.label: Unreachable
parameter.description: Set to "true" when the device is unreachable.

parameter.label: Sticky unreachable
parameter.description: Set to "true" when the device is unreachable. It stays "true" until reset manually.

parameter.label: RSSI
parameter.description: The RSSI of the device in dBm.

parameter.label: Low battery
parameter.description: Set to "true" when the battery or super capacitor is empty.

parameter.label: RF channel
parameter.description: The channel of the communication interface to use. For this device it is automatically set to a free channel during the pairing process.

parameter.label: Current valve position
parameter.description: The current valve position returned by the device.

parameter.label: Energy insufficient
parameter.description: "true" when the energy storage is not sufficiently charged.

parameter.label: Cover open
parameter.description: "true" when the contact or cover is open.

parameter.label: Temperature out of range
parameter.description: "true" when the measured temperature is below 0°C or above 40°C.

parameter.label: Energy input
parameter.description: "true" when the battery is being charged.

parameter.label: Current temperature
parameter.description: The temperature measured by the valve drive.

parameter.label: Service command
parameter.description: The service mode to set. The most important one is "SummerMode" to reduce the energy consumption in summer.
